name: boulzy/manager-bundle
description: The BoulzyManagerBundle provides a base to implement in order to homogenize your models logic. It also provides a basic implementation for Doctrine managed models.

suggest.symfony/symfony: This bundle offers more features when used as a Symfony bundle.
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-bundle: This bundle offers more features when used with Doctrine.
suggest.doctrine/orm: This bundle offers more features when used with Doctrine.
